tool_description:
Your API for emergency response. When your product senses danger, SafeTrek sends help.

1. Your product triggers an alarm.
2. Our certified call centers check in immediately.
3. Your customer’s info is already on file. Help is dispatched right away.

As our phones-and keys, watches, homes, and cars have gotten smarter, 911 has had trouble keeping up. That’s where we come in. Our API transforms applications and devices into life-saving tools. Devices can be used to trigger an alarm, and ...
name: SafeTrek
title: SafeTrek

api_list.name: audience
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cleech-safetrek-v1.p.rapidapi.com/authorize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cleech-safetrek-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cleech-safetrek-v1.p.rapidapi.com/authorize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cleech-safetrek-v1.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
